medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The rash began 4 weeks prior to presentation and was accompanied by 1 week of bilateral elbow and knee pain. The rash initially improved after starting prednisone but recurred at the 10 mg/d dosing.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recurrent episodes of diverticulitis complicated by colovesical fistula; underwent sigmoid colon resection with fistula repair 6 weeks ago; medical history includes glaucoma, gastroesophageal reflux disease, and osteoarthritis.
medical_history.social_history: No alcohol or tobacco use; no sick contacts or recent travel.
